thread.section_title: Prestige Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Prestige Flowers | www.prestigeflowers.co.uk | 48 of 975
thread.title: Tom Henderson
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Tom Henderson

author: Tom Henderson
title: Tom Henderson
text:
My first time buying online flowers. Very easy to navigate site and decide what combination of flowers/gift/size.
The only downside was the first registration offer code disappeared once I'd got to the ordering page. However I did open another page and search for Prestige discounts and got an equivalent discount immediately.
All in all 9/10 - hopefully the flowers fit the bill also!
